page.title: 02THE COMMUNITY
page.content: The people of the area could be divided into two well_defined and almost separate groups,namely Catholics and Protestants.These live peacefully together yet most live separately from each other.They each have their own schools,halls,sports, pastimes,celebrations and interests.The so_called "Troubles"of the past sixteen years would be a constant topic of conversation and source of concern for the people of the area as would be the case elsewhere in Northern Ireland.Although there have been a few serious incidents in the area people still, generally speaking manage to live peacefully together.Many of course do work together and mix socially in spite of the very obvious sectarian division.
